[[Royalty Records|Royalty]] | associated_acts = | website = }} '''Colin Amey''' (born [[Dunnville, Ontario]]) is a Canadian [[country music]] artist. Amey has released three studio albums which include 1998's ''Colin Amey'', 2000's ''What My Heart Don't Know'' and 2006's ''Getaway''. Two of Amey's singles reached the Top 20 on the ''[[RPM (magazine)|RPM]]'' Country Tracks chart in Canada, "I Wish She Was Mine" and "What My Heart Don't Know." ==Discography== ===Albums=== {| class="wikitable" !
